colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING LA TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL BA'I KHYER BDE BA 'DI NI, ,^JANG JONG CHEN PO CHEN WANG GI MDA' 'BANGS TSUL KHRIMS RNAM DAG MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN PA SMYUNG GNAS PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DANG GSO RTZIS KYI BLO RIG DANG LDAN PA DEM CHE BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG DANG, ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RGYAS RNAMS NAN TAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR BSRUNG BA'I PHYIR, ^BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA MTSAN GZHAN BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL, BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING DANG CHOS SKYONG GZHAN LA TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL BA'I CHO GA MI MTHONG ZHING, BLA MA YI DAM RNAMS KYIS TSOGS MCHOD RNAMS YID SHES 'GRI NAS @006A *, ,BRIS PA 'DI LA LHAG CHAD MA DAG PA DANG TSUL MIN PA'I NYES SKYON THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA TSOGS DANG, KHYAD PAR LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS LA BZOD GSOL LO, ,SGRIB PAR MI 'GYUR BAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DES BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI DAM TSIG NYAMS CHAGS SDIG SGRIB RNAMS BYANG ZHING DAG NAS, ,BSTAN 'GRO'I PHAN DON DU MCHOG MTHUN GYIS DNGOS GRUB 'THOB PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO,, ,,DGE'O, ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
